title: Hedge fund managing partner Dmitry Balyasny taps AI as largest tail risk for 2026
description: ABU DHABI, Dec 9 (Reuters) - Hedge fund Balyasny Asset Management's managing partner said on Tuesday that the largest tail risk for the year ahead is if artificial intelligence surprises on the upside or the downside.

title: AI fraud in court? Supreme Court detects hundreds of fabricated judgements in high-profile corporate battle
description: Supreme Court has uncovered the deliberate misuse of artificial intelligence in court filings, where a litigant fabricated hundreds of case laws in an attempt to mislead the court. This unprecedented controversy has raised serious alarm, prompting the court to stress the need for accountability while continuing to hear the matter on its merits. The episode has also highlighted the growing risks of unregulated AI in legal proceedings.

title: US Busts Network Smuggling Advanced Nvidia Chips to China
description: The U.S. has been attempting to contain China’s business and technological advances in the race for artificial intelligence.
content: U.S. authorities have broken up a network that smuggled millions of dollars worth of advanced artificial intelligence (AI) computer chips to China and have detained two Chinese natives linked to the operation, the Department of Justice (DOJ) has said... [4208 chars]

title: Google faces EU antitrust investigation into AI Overviews
description: Alphabet's Google faces an EU antitrust investigation into its use of web publishers' online content and YouTube videos to train its artificial intelligence models, the European Commission said on Tuesday.
content:
The Commission, which acts as the EU competition enforcer, said it was concerned that Google may be using publishers' online content without compensating them adequately and without giving them the option to refuse the use of their content.
